definitions.definition: An unpreparedness , unwillingness , or an inability to believe that something is the case .
examples: She cried out in disbelief on hearing that terrorists had crashed an airplane into the World Trade Center in New York City.
I stared in disbelief at the Grand Canyon.

definitions.definition: The loss or abandonment of a belief ; the cessation of belief .

main_definition: An unpreparedness , unwillingness , or an inability to believe that something is the case .
secondary_definitions: The loss or abandonment of a belief ; the cessation of belief .
